vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for the renewal and amendment of Specific Use Permit (SUP) No. 2078 for an industrial (outside) potentially incompatible use limited to concrete or asphalt crushing and to add concrete or asphalt batching on property zoned an IM Industrial Manufacturing District, along the east line of Luna Road, north of Ryan Road 
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval for a five-year period, subject to amended site plan and amended conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Denial
Z234-337(TB)

*In alignment with ForwardDallas.
